thread.title: BRIEF-Loxo Oncology Completes Rolling Submission Of New Drug Application To U.S. Food And Drug Administration

title: BRIEF-Loxo Oncology Completes Rolling Submission Of New Drug Application To U.S. Food And Drug Administration

organizations.name: u.s. food and drug administration reuters staff

text: March 26, 2018 / 10:55 AM / Updated 20 minutes ago BRIEF-Loxo Oncology Completes Rolling Submission Of New Drug Application To U.S. Food And Drug Administration Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 26 (Reuters) - Loxo Oncology Inc: * LOXO ONCOLOGY COMPLETES ROLLING SUBMISSION OF NEW DRUG APPLICATION TO U.S. FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION FOR LAROTRECTINIB FOR THE TREATMENT OF TRK FUSION CANCER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
